Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Friis Madsen Krog at a charity gala in Madrid. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Friis Madsen Krog is a 49 year old and comes from Spain.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Friis Madsen Krog and Amanda have been married since 2004. Their children are named Jespersen and Line.
Education Background:
Friis earned his secondary school diploma from Østre Borgerdyd Gymnasium in 1993.
Friis attended Technical University of Denmark (DTU) and graduated in 2000.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 26 years, Friis Madsen Krog brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Friis Madsen Krog began his professional journey as a Aerospace Engineer at Alestis Aerospace S.L. in 1999, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Program Manager at Airbus España S.L. in 2001, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 3330000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He does not have any inheritances.
